name: TILE RUNNERS
description:
TILE RUNNERS - A short game developed for the UCA Easter Games Jam.

The concept is "Running out of space".

So, run your way around this game and shoot your enemies before the time runs out and they steal all your precious space.

Run through tiles to make them yours and overstep your enemies. Be aware though, they will do the same to you! Find the best strategy to win and if you fail at first, replay the game and show me your best score!

Thank you all!

Vitor Cardoso.
